name: Street Car 450
description:
Keep all your knickknacks organized in one place with this little carryall. The photo featured on this zipper pouch was taken in 1910 of two men in front of the Cornish Loop street car, Winnipeg.

Measuring 6X8 inches, its the perfect size for all your needs.

spot wash, hang dry

*please read shop policies and FAQ before purchase*

name: the Broadway Pillow
description:
The Broadway is based on a photo from my personal collection taken in 1933.  This two sided pillow measuring 20" by 15" is a great accent piece to any home and tells a great story. Photograph on the front and the original writing from that picture is also printed on the back of your pillow.

Printed on Kona Cotton, The Broadway is soft enough for a nap on the couch yet durable enough for everyday wear.

Your pillow comes with a zipper closure so it can easily be washed and refreshed.

Fits Ikea pillow "inner" polyester measuring 24'' by 16"

Item listed is for a pillow cover and does not include an actual pillow insert.

** currently made to order - please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery from purchase date**


*Please read shop policies before purchase*

name: HBC '31
description:
HBC '31` is based on a photo from my personal collection taken in 1931.  Its a flash back to a different time and a different view of this iconic building.  This two sided pillow measuring 20" by 15" is a great accent piece to any home and tells a great story. Photograph on the front and the original writing from that picture is also printed on the back of your pillow.

Printed on Kona Cotton, the HBC '31 is soft enough for a nap on the couch yet durable enough for everyday use.

Your pillow comes with a zipper closure so it can easily be washed and refreshed.

Fits Ikea pillow "inner" polyester measuring 24'' by 16"

Check the FAQ on why the measurements are different.

Item listed is for a pillow cover and does not include an actual pillow insert. 

** this item is currently made to order and ships 4-6 weeks from purchase date **

*Please read shop policies before purchase*

name: Lace TeePee
description:
Inspire imagination with this gorgeous play TeePee. So pretty, it will make a great addition to any home. Keep it set up in a main living area to create a space your child can call her own.  Folds up without any dis-assembly and can be place in the corner for storage.
Take it to the beach, move it outside for an afternoon of fun or keep it inside for a reading nook.  The possibilities are endless.

The base of your tent measures approximately 50inch X 50inch and stands 5 feet tall when in use.  Folded up, the height is 6 feet.  Your play teepee is delivered fully assembled and ready for use.

Included in this sale:
Lace tent
Rope with leather feathers for top of TeePee 
4 walnut stained poles 6 feet tall

**delivery in 2-4 weeks
**currently only taking local orders


LOCAL OPTION
Free Delivery within Winnipeg city limits.  Please select country  'Togo' in shipping option for Free City of Winnipeg delivery.


FINAL-SALE *Please read shop policies and FAQ before purchase*
Tent is intended for play and offers no protection from outdoor elements.  Never leave children unsupervised while playing with teepee. Additional fees, such as duty may be charged to international customers and is the responsibility of the purchaser.

name: Train Organic Cotton Blanket
description:
Vintage inspired organic cotton blanket.

The Train blanket is based on a photo from 1929 taken in Altona, Manitoba.

You have the option between two sizes, Small measuring approximately 28 inches x 33 inches and and large measuring around 34 inches x 56 inches.

The small is just the right size and stretch for that perfect swaddle on your new baby or use it for a car seat snuggler. A great addition to any child's room.

The large is just right for you and a book or a small companion. 

The edges of your blanket come professionally serged and photo image is set on a white organic cotton backdrop. Handmade in Canada on a made to order basis.  Please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.


Blankets are made with 100% USA certified organic cotton

*please visit our Policies and FAQ page*

name: Horse Kiss Organic Cotton Blanket
description:
'Horse Kiss' is a photo from a friend taken in British Columbia turned softest blanket ever! 

You have the option between two sizes, Small measuring approximately 28 inches x 33 inches and and large measuring around 34 inches x 56 inches.

This silky soft blanket measures approximately 28 inches x 33 inches and is just the right size and stretch for that perfect swaddle on your new baby.  Gift it to a friend or keep it for yourself, this sweet blanket also makes for a great car seat snuggler and is the perfect addition to any child's room.

The edges of your blanket come professionally serged and photo is set on solid white organic cotton.  Hand made in Canada on a made to order basis.  Please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.


Do not use blankets & pillows as bedding. 

Blankets are made with 100% USA certified organic cotton

*please visit our policies and FAQ page*

name: Swan Organic Cotton Blanket
description:
Vintage inspired organic cotton blanket.

The Swan blanket is based on a photo from my personal collection.  The photo was taken in 1932 at Assiniboine Park, Winnipeg Manitoba.

You have the option between two sizes, Small measuring approximately 28 inches x 33 inches and and large measuring around 34 inches x 56 inches.

The small is just the right size and stretch for that perfect swaddle on your new baby or use it for a car seat snuggler. A great addition to any child's room.

The large is just right for you and a book or a small companion. 

The edges of your blanket come professionally serged and photo is set on solid white organic cotton.  Hand made in Canada on a made to order basis.  

**Please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.


Blankets are made with 100% USA certified organic cotton

*please visit our shop policies and FAQ section*

name: Confetti Geo Organic leggings
description:
Extra soft and fresh, our leggings will keep your babe hip, cool and comfortable all at the same time. 

Exclusive pattern designed by THREADXTWILL makes sure you are ahead of the trend and like no one else!

Your leggings are made from organic cotton and double stitched for extra durability.

Each item is hand made just for you! Please note pattern placement will vary and not be exactly as shown in picture.
Please allow 4-6 weeks per order.

Hand wash with phosphate free detergent and hang to dry to retain shape and color.


*please read FAQ and shop policies before purchase*
